Module com.example.towersofhanoi

Package com.example.towersofhanoi.Model

package com.example.towersofhanoi.Model
This package contains the "Model" classes for the Towers of Hanoi game. The model classes implement the business logic and define how data can be accessed, created, stored and changed
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.example.towersofhanoi
     
    com.example.towersofhanoi.Controller
    This package contains the "Controller" classes for the Towers of Hanoi game.
    com.example.towersofhanoi.View
    This package contains the "View" classes for the Towers of Hanoi game.
  • Class
    Description
    AutomaticGame
    The AutomaticGame class represents an automatic game of the Towers of Hanoi.
    DatabaseConnection<T>
    The DatabaseConnection interface defines the methods for connecting to a database, performing various operations, and extracting data from the database.
    Game
    The Game class is an abstract class that represents a Towers of Hanoi game.
    MongoDBConnection
    The MongoDBConnection class represents a connection to a MongoDB database.
    MySQLConnection
    This class represents a connection to a MySQL database and implements the DatabaseConnection interface.
    PlayerGame
    The PlayerGame class represents a game of Towers of Hanoi played by a player.
    StatisticsData<T>
    The StatisticsData class is used for adding user data to the table with the best 10 performances of the users.
    TutorialThread
    The TutorialThread class represents a thread that displays the automatic game (computer's solution).
    User
    The User class represents a user and provides methods to update user data from different databases.
